text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Hello, Barbie. Don't forget all of the new lockdowns, because Donnie opened up with no universal testing, contact trace, & mask policy in place. More unemployed coming thanks to his ignoring Covid19. It's not going away, they're not embers they're FOREST FIRES. #TrumpIsKillingUs https://t.co/0dh6xrvfFB
